definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The cement hardens quickly, creating an internal cast inside of the fractured vertebra.
sentences.chinese: 骨水泥很快变硬，在骨折椎体内部形成内支架。

sentences.english: If your refrigerator is too cold, some of the natural fats may harden.
sentences.chinese: 假如冰箱太冷，可能会使瓶内的天然脂肪变硬。

sentences.english: Hours in the car or at a desk cause hip flexor muscles to shorten and stay tight.
sentences.chinese: 在汽车或桌子前一坐几个小时使你的股屈肌缩短变硬。

sentences.english: Remember, the same heat that melts butter also hardens clay.
sentences.chinese: 请记住，热可以融化黄油也可以使陶土变硬。

sentences.english: These minerals form crystals and harden the plaque structure.
sentences.chinese: 这些矿物质形成了菌斑的结晶变硬的结构。

sentences.english: The paint takes a few minutes to harden.
sentences.chinese: 这油漆需要几分钟才会变硬。

sentences.english: Toughens the Barbarian's skin, increasing armor by X%.
sentences.chinese: 使野蛮人的皮肤变硬，增加X%护甲。

sentences.english: This lignification serves to stiffen and strengthen the cells.
sentences.chinese: 木质化足以使细胞变硬和增强。

sentences.english: If your refrigerator is too cold, some of the natural fats may harden. To liquefy, simply run warm (not hot) water over the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的冰箱太冻，可能会令瓶内的天然脂肪变硬。

sentences.english: Put the tray back into the freezer for three minutes for the ice cream to harden.
sentences.chinese: 把整个模具再次放到冰箱里3分钟让冰淇淋变硬。

sentences.english: Cook spaghetti in boiling water until al dente, about 8 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在沸水锅中煮面条，约8分钟后面条变硬。

sentences.english: With the temprature cool, magma would be hardened into rock.
sentences.chinese: 温度越来越低，岩浆也就变硬，最后成了岩石。

sentences.english: If it can’t, that means it has hardened into ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 假如挤不动，这说明酸奶已经变硬成了冰激凌。

sentences.english: Boulders of hardening lava can rain down on villages.
sentences.chinese: 变硬的熔岩块象雨点般降落在山下村庄。

sentences.english: The finished ice cream batch is then sent to a hardening freezer.
sentences.chinese: 混合好的成品，接着送进冷冻库，等着冰淇淋变硬。

sentences.english: Clay hardens when it becomes dry.
sentences.chinese: 黏土干了的时候就变硬了。

definition: to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
to bubble/to foam/to blister/to sprout boils (on one's body)/sparkling (wine etc)
to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
